summary: A wrapper around an argparse.Namespace that exposes Certbot configuration options as attributes and computes related filesystem paths (accounts, live, renewal, temporary checkpoints, etc.) based on the work and configuration directories. It also records where each argument originated and allows runtime overrides of settings.
business_intent: Provide Certbot components with a unified, object‑oriented view of command‑line arguments and derived configuration data, handling path resolution, argument source tracking, and runtime overrides to simplify access and management of settings.
